field.name: summary
field.value: ContainerWrapper believes it is an IWindsorContainer, though it is not declared as such.

field.name: description
field.value:
The Castle.Windsor.Adapters.ComponentModel.ContainerWrapper returns a reference to itself when it is asked 'GetService' for the type 'IWindsorContainer', yet the ContainerWrapper does NOT implement IWindsorContainer, meaning that the caller will experience a class cast exception (or null result, when safe-casting).
Regardless, the return value is useless.

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Fixed''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''Future''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Work Started'' to ''Resolved''.
